It's an error, but a weird one:

  arguments are located on different GPUs at /home/ezyang/Dev/pytorch-python2/
  aten/src/THC/generated/../generic/THCTensorMathPointwise.cu:313

The reason you get this error is because a result tensor is allocated on GPU 1, and now it can't participate in the operation because you have two GPU 0 inputs and another GPU 1 input (for the otuput).

It's an error, but a weird one:

```
  arguments are located on different GPUs at /home/ezyang/Dev/pytorch-python2/
  aten/src/THC/generated/../generic/THCTensorMathPointwise.cu:313
```

The reason you get this error is because a result tensor is allocated on GPU 1, and now it can't participate in the operation because you have two GPU 0 inputs and another GPU 1 input (for the otuput).
